verses.roman:
bhaṭṭācārya bale--prabhu nā karaha vismaya
yei khābe, tāṅhāra śaktye bhoga siddha haya

synonyms: bhaṭṭācārya bale—Bhaṭṭācārya said; prabhu—my Lord; nā karaha vismaya—do not become astonished; yei khābe—whoever shall eat; tāṅhāra śaktye—by His grace; bhoga—the food; siddha haya—has been prepared.
translation: Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya said, "It is not so wonderful, my Lord. Everything has been made possible by the energy and mercy of He who will eat the food.
